content: Can I request someone more knowledgeable on matroids to review #26510? It has basically been sitting in the queue for half a year now. If there are no one available I'll give it my best approximation of a review based on my superficial understandings on matroids later this week.
I can take this one. But I'm slightly confused why you say it's been in the queue for a year!
Sorry I meant half a year :sweat_smile:
